Description: Bezel and part of hoop of a corroded copper alloy integral finger-ring; bezel elaborated with incised decoration.
Curator's comments: W.M.F. Petrie, Tanis ii, Nebesheh and Defenneh, p. 80 § 80, concerning a bronze ring, "egyptian, minutely inscribed Ptahhotep".
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1888 / Tanis. Part II. Nebesheh (Am) and Defenneh (Tahpanhes) (p. 80 § 80)
Leclère and Spencer 2014 / Tell Dafana Reconsidered: The Archaeology of an Egyptian Frontier Town (p.68, p.182, pl.24)
